note:
I'm a retired,74 year old human married to Bill for 56 years this year. Last job e-learning facilitator for National College of School Leadership. I'm anti-capitalist, anarcho-syndicalist. I volunteer in my community, love growing plants, live music from classical, opera to experimental, jazz, etc. Have two cats and one son and a deceased daughter. Optimist, glass half full. Proud to be Woke.
Vegetarian not vegan #NoDirectMessages
